sentences.en: A bigot is a stone - leaf orator.
sentences.cn: 偏执狂是极聋的演说家.

sentences.en: And when you try to impose them on others, you make yourself aaa self - righteous bigot.
sentences.cn: 而当你试图将这些规则强加于他人时, 只会让别人对你产生厌恶的情绪(霸权,自以为是的).

sentences.en: Anyone who opposes them is branded a racist, a bigot, or a homophobe.
sentences.cn: 任何反对他们的人都被冠以种族主义者，偏执狂或同性恋憎恨者的污名。

sentences.en: Bigot: you beat them unconscious with the parachute.
sentences.cn: 条子 ︰ 用这个降落伞把他们打成猪头.

sentences.en: His words stamped him to be a bigot.
sentences.cn: 他讲的话表明他是个偏执的人.

sentences.en: Pretty soon everyone in his dorm labels him as an intolerant bigot.
sentences.cn: 很快他就会被那栋宿舍其他人打上“偏执的盲目信仰者”的标签.

sentences.en: So you only act like a bigot and a sexist pig around me?
sentences.cn: 那就让你在我面前表现的像头盲目自大的猪?
